content.value:
I feel like at least once a week, someone asks me what they can do to help women or mothers or people from underrepresented communities. 

My answer is always the same: HIRE THEM. PAY THEM. 

It’s not complicated!
content.html: I feel like at least once a week, someone asks me what they can do to help women or mothers or people from underrepresented communities. My answer is always the same: HIRE THEM. PAY THEM. It’s not complicated!
